column21: "Parking and loading shall meet the needs of all business or other uses under the terms of any site plan requirement unless otherwise approved under Sections 5.4, and/or Section 5.5" (page 20). Minimum side/rear setbacks for accessory structures is 20ft rather than 50ft. Additional regulations on lot sizing found in Section 6.2(C) in zoning code on page 61.
Accessory structures are permitted as additions to existing structures only and can only be built outside the floodway. ADUs greater than 500sqft require conditional use approval.

Minimum setbacks for accessory structures is 20ft rather than 25ft. "Parking and loading shall meet the needs of all business or other uses under the terms of any site plan requirement unless otherwise approved under Sections 5.4, and/or Section 5.5" (page 20). New ADUs are permitted only for existing structures.

Site plan review required for multifamily housing under 7 units. Conditional use review required for multifamily housing greater or equal to 7 units. Both require public hearings. Minimum side/rear setbacks for accessory structures are 10ft rather than 50ft. "Parking and loading shall meet the needs of all business or other uses under the terms of any site plan requirement unless otherwise approved under Sections 5.4, and/or Section 5.5" (page 20).

Site plan review required for multifamily housing under 7 units. Conditional use review required for multifamily housing greater or equal to 7 units. Both require public hearings. Minimum side/rear setbacks for accessory structures is 20ft rather than 25ft. "Parking and loading shall meet the needs of all business or other uses under the terms of any site plan requirement unless otherwise approved under Sections 5.4, and/or Section 5.5" (page 20). Maximum building footprint is 25,000sqft. "In the Mixed Use District, all subdivisions shall be reviewed and approved as a PUD" (page 55).

column21: Site plan review required for multifamily housing under 7 units. Conditional use review required for multifamily housing greater or equal to 7 units. Both require public hearings. Minimum side/rear setbacks for accessory structures is 5ft rather than 10ft. "Parking and loading shall meet the needs of all business or other uses under the terms of any site plan requirement unless otherwise approved under Sections 5.4, and/or Section 5.5" (page 20). Maximum building footprint is 25,000sqft.

"Parking and loading shall meet the needs of all business or other uses under the terms of any site plan requirement unless otherwise approved under Sections 5.4, and/or Section 5.5" (page 20). Frontage for all lots: If <5 acres, minimum frontage = 200ft; If >=5 acres, minimum frontage = 300ft. Additional regulations on lot sizing found in Section 6.2(C) in zoning code on page 61.

column20: Waste/Water required either via public or community (non-municipal but local private entity) services. "Either the primary single family dwelling or the accessory dwelling must be occupied by the owner" (page 24) means that the owner does not have to occupy the ADU if they occupy the primary residence.
column21: Site plan review required for multifamily housing under 7 units. Conditional use review required for multifamily housing greater or equal to 7 units. Both require public hearings. Minimum side/rear setbacks for accessory structures is 5ft rather than 6ft. "Parking and loading shall meet the needs of all business or other uses under the terms of any site plan requirement unless otherwise approved under Sections 5.4, and/or Section 5.5" (page 20). Maximum building footprint is 25,000sqft.
